methods.name: get_intrinsic_size
methods.summary: Get the intrinsic size of a plot if known
methods.description: The intrinsic size of a plot is the size that the plot would be rendered at if no size constraints were applied by Positron.

schema.name: intrinsic_size_result
schema.description: The intrinsic size of the plot if known

size.name: intrinsic_size
size.description: The intrinsic size of a plot

width.description: The intrinsic width of the plot

height.description: The intrinsic height of the plot

unit.description: The unit of measurement of the plot's dimensions

source.description: The source of the intrinsic size e.g. 'Matplotlib'

methods.name: render
methods.description: Requests a plot to be rendered at a given height and width. The plot data is returned in a base64-encoded string.

params.name: height
params.description: The requested plot height, in pixels

params.name: width
params.description: The requested plot width, in pixels

params.name: pixel_ratio
params.description: The pixel ratio of the display device

data.description: The plot data, as a base64-encoded string

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the plot data

plot_unit.description: The unit of measurement of a plot's dimensions
